title: Authors and Citation
text: Miu Shing Hung. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Hung M (2024). scUnify: Unification single-cell multi-modal processing visualization tools.. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://mshung229.github.io/scUnify/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {scUnify: Unification of single-cell multi-modal processing and visualization tools.},   author = {Miu Shing Hung},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://mshung229.github.io/scUnify/}, }

what: Unification of single-cell multi-modal processing and visualization tools.
title: Unification of single-cell multi-modal processing and visualization tools.
text: scUnify R package simplify single-cell omic pipelines provide customisable visualization functions multi-omic datasets. Please refer scUnify vignette example usage explanations function module. comprehensive applications functions/modules real single-cell data analysis please refer SCWorkBook documentation details.

title: Unification of single-cell multi-modal processing and visualization tools.
Unification of single-cell multi-modal processing and visualization tools.
code: ## Install CRAN packages options(timeout = 500) cran <- c(     "tidyverse", "ggrepel", "patchwork", "cowplot", "scales", "ggh4x",     "grid", "gridExtra", "viridis", "wesanderson", "RColorBrewer", "qs",      "readxl", "writexl", "rstatix", "ggpubr", "Seurat", "harmony") install.packages(cran)  ## Install Bioconductor packages bioc <- c("biomaRt", "BiocParallel", "UCell", "celda", "scDblFinder", "ComplexHeatmap") if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))     install.packages("BiocManager") BiocManager::install(bioc)  ## Install Github packages git <- c("chris-mcginnis-ucsf/DoubletFinder", "mojaveazure/seurat-disk") if (!require("devtools", quietly = TRUE))     install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github(git)

title: Unification of single-cell multi-modal processing and visualization tools.

title: calculate_mad — calculate_mad
text: x Seurat object columns vector metadata columns calculate MAD samples metadata column sample names stdev label poor quality cells stdev*MAD away median column. Defaults 5

title: convert_human_to_mouse — convert_human_to_mouse
text: Convert human (HGNC) gene symbols mouse (MGI) gene symbols; disable one--many mapping

title: convert_human_to_mouse — convert_human_to_mouse
text: x vector HGNC gene symbols. unique Whether disable one--many MGI gene symbols returned. Defaults TRUE disable one--many mapping (TRUE)

title: convert_human_to_mouse — convert_human_to_mouse
text: unique = TRUE, returns vector unique MGI gene symbols mapped one--one. unique = FALSE, returns data frame columns "MGI.symbol" "HGNC.symbol" mapped one--many.

Defaults "umap" assay assay name gene expression. Defaults "RNA" return_genes TRUE, return genes assays named c("CC", "BCR", "TCR", "MHC") current assay. Defaults TRUE

title: run_doubletfinder — run_doubletfinder
text: x Seurat object assay assay name, defaults "RNA" dims . PCs, defaults 1:10 truth whether cell demultiplexing (ground-truth) result available. Defaults NULL, else set metadata column values "Singlet" "Doublet". clusters metadata column containing cluster labels dbr doublet rate ncores cores used parallel processing, defaults 1

title: run_scdblfinder — run_scdblfinder
text: x Seurat object assay assay name, defaults "RNA" samples metadata column containing sample labels truth whether cell demultiplexing (ground-truth) result available. Defaults NULL, else set metadata column values "Singlet" "Doublet". clusters metadata column containing cluster labels dbr doublet rate ncores cores used parallel processing, defaults 1

text: Plot DensityUMAP Seurat object

text: x Seurat object reduction reduction name, defaults "umap" split.metadata column group adjust adjust stat_density_2d()

title: scDotPlot — scDotPlot
text: Plot DotPlot Seurat object

title: scDotPlot — scDotPlot
code: scDotPlot(   x,   group.by,   split.by = NULL,   features,   assay = "RNA",   slot = "data",   scale = T,   palette = "RdBu",   direction = -1,   diffexp = NULL,   coord_flip = T,   unique = F )

title: scDotPlot — scDotPlot
text: x Seurat object group.metadata column group split.metadata column group features feature names stored vector named list assay assay name, defaults "RNA" slot slot name, defaults "data" scale TRUE, scale gene expression across cells. Defaults TRUE palette vector colors, defaults "Reds" RColorBrewer direction direction palette, default 1 diffexp whether plot significance, input can either dataframe csv file path Seurat::FindAllMarkers output. Defaults NULL. coord_flip TRUE, plot features y-axis. Defaults TRUE unique TRUE, repeat feature names. Defaults FALSE

title: scFeaturePlot — scFeaturePlot
text: Plot FeaturePlot Seurat object

title: scFeaturePlot — scFeaturePlot
text: x Seurat object features feature names stored vector ncol . columns plots plot TRUE, plot cowplot::plot_grid(). Defaults FALSE return list ggplot objects ... arguments Seurat::FeaturePlot()

title: scUMAP — scUMAP
text: Plot UMAP Seurat object

title: scUMAP — scUMAP
code: scUMAP(   x,   reduction = "umap",   group.by,   cols = NULL,   count = F,   pt.size = NULL,   legend.ncol = 1,   ... )

title: scUMAP — scUMAP
text: x Seurat object reduction reduction name, defaults "umap" group.metadata column group cols vector colors, defaults NULL count TRUE, count . cells group. Defaults FALSE pt.size size cell/point UMAP legend.ncol . columns group.keys legend ... arguments Seurat::DimPlot()
